prompts:
Hello, Claude! You are currently connected to the Smithery deployment of Thoughtbox, whose codebase we're currently in. We've made some significant updates today, and I'd like you to test out the full spectrum of functionality on this server. Here's the list of tests: Thoughtbox MCP Server - Comprehensive Test Suite

  You are testing a Thoughtbox MCP server deployment. Execute ALL of the following tests systematically and report results for each operation.

  SERVER CAPABILITIES OVERVIEW

  Tools (2 total)

  1. thoughtbox - Step-by-step thinking tool for complex reasoning
  2. notebook - Literate programming toolhost (dispatcher with 10 operations)

  Prompts (2 total)

  1. list_mcp_assets - Lists all server capabilities
  2. interleaved-thinking - IRCoT workflow with parameters: task (required), thoughts_limit (optional), clear_folder (optional)

  Resources (4 total)

  1. system://status - Server health snapshot
  2. thoughtbox://notebook/operations - Complete operations catalog
  3. thoughtbox://patterns-cookbook - Reasoning patterns guide
  4. thoughtbox://architecture - Server architecture documentation

  Resource Templates (1)

  - thoughtbox://interleaved/{mode} - Interleaved thinking guides (modes: research, analysis, development)

  Notebook Templates (1)

  - sequential-feynman - Deep learning workflow using Feynman Technique

  ---
  TEST PLAN

  PHASE 1: Server Health & Discovery

  Test 1.1: List Tools
  - Call tools/list and verify 2 tools returned: thoughtbox, notebook

  Test 1.2: List Prompts
  - Call prompts/list and verify 2 prompts: list_mcp_assets, interleaved-thinking

  Test 1.3: List Resources
  - Call resources/list and verify 4 resources with correct URIs

  Test 1.4: List Resource Templates
  - Call resources/templates/list and verify interleaved template with correct URI pattern

  Test 1.5: Server Status
  - Read resource system://status and verify JSON response with health status

  ---
  PHASE 2: Thoughtbox Tool Testing

  Test 2.1: Basic Forward Thinking
  {
    "thought": "Analyzing the problem",
    "thoughtNumber": 1,
    "totalThoughts": 3,
    "nextThoughtNeeded": true
  }
  - Verify patterns cookbook embedded resource at thought 1

  Test 2.2: Mid-sequence Thought
  {
    "thought": "Exploring solution space",
    "thoughtNumber": 2,
    "totalThoughts": 3,
    "nextThoughtNeeded": true
  }
  - Verify NO cookbook in response

  Test 2.3: Final Thought
  {
    "thought": "Conclusion reached",
    "thoughtNumber": 3,
    "totalThoughts": 3,
    "nextThoughtNeeded": false
  }
  - Verify patterns cookbook embedded at final thought

  Test 2.4: Revision Pattern
  {
    "thought": "Correcting previous analysis",
    "thoughtNumber": 2,
    "totalThoughts": 3,
    "isRevision": true,
    "revisesThought": 1,
    "nextThoughtNeeded": true
  }

  Test 2.5: Branch Pattern
  {
    "thought": "Exploring alternative approach",
    "thoughtNumber": 2,
    "totalThoughts": 3,
    "branchFromThought": 1,
    "branchId": "alt-approach-1",
    "nextThoughtNeeded": true
  }

  Test 2.6: Request Guide Mid-sequence
  {
    "thought": "Need to review patterns",
    "thoughtNumber": 2,
    "totalThoughts": 3,
    "includeGuide": true,
    "nextThoughtNeeded": true
  }
  - Verify cookbook embedded despite mid-sequence

  Test 2.7: Backward Thinking
  {
    "thought": "Working backward from goal",
    "thoughtNumber": 5,
    "totalThoughts": 5,
    "nextThoughtNeeded": true
  }
  - Verify totalThoughts auto-adjusts if exceeded

  ---
  PHASE 3: Notebook Operations Testing

  Test 3.1: Create Blank Notebook
  {
    "operation": "create",
    "args": {
      "title": "Test Notebook",
      "language": "typescript"
    }
  }
  - Capture notebookId from response

  Test 3.2: Create from Sequential-Feynman Template
  {
    "operation": "create",
    "args": {
      "title": "Learning React Hooks",
      "language": "typescript",
      "template": "sequential-feynman"
    }
  }
  - Capture notebookId
  - Verify response includes cellCount > 1 (template has multiple cells)

  Test 3.3: List Notebooks
  {
    "operation": "list",
    "args": {}
  }
  - Verify at least 2 notebooks (from tests 3.1 and 3.2)

  Test 3.4: Add Title Cell
  {
    "operation": "add_cell",
    "args": {
      "notebookId": "<from 3.1>",
      "cellType": "title",
      "content": "Data Analysis Demo"
    }
  }
  - Capture cellId

  Test 3.5: Add Markdown Cell
  {
    "operation": "add_cell",
    "args": {
      "notebookId": "<from 3.1>",
      "cellType": "markdown",
      "content": "## Introduction\nThis notebook demonstrates data processing."
    }
  }

  Test 3.6: Add Code Cell
  {
    "operation": "add_cell",
    "args": {
      "notebookId": "<from 3.1>",
      "cellType": "code",
      "content": "console.log('Hello from code cell');",
      "filename": "hello.ts"
    }
  }
  - Capture cellId for execution test

  Test 3.7: Update Cell Content
  {
    "operation": "update_cell",
    "args": {
      "notebookId": "<from 3.1>",
      "cellId": "<from 3.6>",
      "content": "console.log('Updated code');\nconsole.log('Exit code:', 0);"
    }
  }

  Test 3.8: List Cells
  {
    "operation": "list_cells",
    "args": {
      "notebookId": "<from 3.1>"
    }
  }
  - Verify at least 3 cells returned

  Test 3.9: Get Cell Details
  {
    "operation": "get_cell",
    "args": {
      "notebookId": "<from 3.1>",
      "cellId": "<from 3.6>"
    }
  }
  - Verify full cell content returned

  Test 3.10: Run Code Cell
  {
    "operation": "run_cell",
    "args": {
      "notebookId": "<from 3.1>",
      "cellId": "<from 3.6>"
    }
  }
  - Verify execution results with stdout/stderr/exitCode

  Test 3.11: Export Notebook (content-only)
  {
    "operation": "export",
    "args": {
      "notebookId": "<from 3.1>"
    }
  }
  - Verify content field contains .src.md format
  - Verify path field is absent (HTTP mode behavior)

  Test 3.12: Load Notebook from Content
  {
    "operation": "load",
    "args": {
      "content": "<content from 3.11>"
    }
  }
  - Verify notebook loaded successfully
  - Verify cellCount matches original

  ---
  PHASE 4: Prompt Testing

  Test 4.1: Get list_mcp_assets Prompt
  {
    "name": "list_mcp_assets",
    "arguments": {}
  }
  - Verify prompt content describes server capabilities

  Test 4.2: Get interleaved-thinking Prompt (Minimal)
  {
    "name": "interleaved-thinking",
    "arguments": {
      "task": "Analyze the architecture of this MCP server"
    }
  }
  - Verify default values: thoughts_limit=100, clear_folder=false

  Test 4.3: Get interleaved-thinking Prompt (Full)
  {
    "name": "interleaved-thinking",
    "arguments": {
      "task": "Design a new feature",
      "thoughts_limit": "50",
      "clear_folder": "true"
    }
  }
  - Verify parameter substitution in content

  ---
  PHASE 5: Resource Testing

  Test 5.1: Read Operations Catalog
  - Read thoughtbox://notebook/operations
  - Verify JSON with 10 operations and 3 categories

  Test 5.2: Read Patterns Cookbook
  - Read thoughtbox://patterns-cookbook
  - Verify markdown content with 6 core patterns

  Test 5.3: Read Architecture Guide
  - Read thoughtbox://architecture
  - Verify markdown documentation content

  Test 5.4: Read Interleaved Guide (Research)
  - Read thoughtbox://interleaved/research
  - Verify markdown guide for research mode

  Test 5.5: Read Interleaved Guide (Analysis)
  - Read thoughtbox://interleaved/analysis
  - Verify markdown guide for analysis mode

  Test 5.6: Read Interleaved Guide (Development)
  - Read thoughtbox://interleaved/development
  - Verify markdown guide for development mode

  ---
  PHASE 6: Error Handling & Edge Cases

  Test 6.1: Invalid Tool Name
  - Call unknown tool, verify error response

  Test 6.2: Invalid Notebook Operation
  - Call notebook with operation: "invalid", verify error

  Test 6.3: Missing Required Parameters (thoughtbox)
  {
    "thought": "Test"
  }
  - Verify error about missing required fields

  Test 6.4: Invalid Template Name
  {
    "operation": "create",
    "args": {
      "title": "Test",
      "language": "typescript",
      "template": "nonexistent-template"
    }
  }
  - Verify helpful error listing available templates

  Test 6.5: Notebook Not Found
  {
    "operation": "list_cells",
    "args": {
      "notebookId": "nonexistent-id"
    }
  }

  Test 6.6: Invalid Interleaved Mode
  - Read thoughtbox://interleaved/invalid-mode
  - Verify error listing valid modes

  Test 6.7: Load with Both Path and Content
  {
    "operation": "load",
    "args": {
      "path": "/some/path",
      "content": "some content"
    }
  }
  - Verify error about mutual exclusivity

  Test 6.8: Load with Neither Path nor Content
  {
    "operation": "load",
    "args": {}
  }
  - Verify error about required parameter

  ---
  EXPECTED RESULTS SUMMARY

  âœ… All tests should pass with:
  - Proper JSON responses for successful operations
  - Error objects with descriptive messages for failures
  - Embedded resources where documented (thoughtbox tool at thought 1, final thought, and on-demand)
  - Resource annotations with correct audience/priority
  - Operation-specific embedded resources for notebook operations
  - Transport-agnostic behavior (export always returns content, load accepts content)

  ðŸ“Š Success Criteria:
  - 60+ total test cases executed
  - 100% of documented features working
  - All error cases handled gracefully
  - Resource embedding working correctly
  - Template system functional

  ---
  Execute each test sequentially, document pass/fail status, and report any unexpected behavior or errors.
